definitions.definition: A member of a modern people that speak a Semitic language .
A member of any of a number of peoples of ancient southwestern Asia and East Africa such as the Akkadians , Assyrians , Arameans , Phoenicians , Canaanites , Hebrews , Arabs , or Aksumites .
A descendant of any of these peoples.
A descendant of the biblical Patriarch Shem .

main_definition: A member of a modern people that speak a Semitic language .
secondary_definitions: A member of any of a number of peoples of ancient southwestern Asia and East Africa such as the Akkadians , Assyrians , Arameans , Phoenicians , Canaanites , Hebrews , Arabs , or Aksumites .
A descendant of any of these peoples.
A descendant of the biblical Patriarch Shem .
